about_the_game:
Whispering from the shadows of neon haze, the Speed Demon is calling you to feed its hunger for adrenaline.

Skill is your greatest ally in the pulsating heart of a retro-futuristic Tokyo, where every second tests your abilities as you weave through cityscapes and dodge obstacles with precise control and razor-sharp reflexes.

Only those daring to harness the daemonic power can carve their name into its legends.
How far will you push before the night claims you?

___

Moto Rush Reborn delivers the ultimate motorbike racing experience for all ages. This fast-paced runner thrusts players into high-octane races through the neon-lit streets of futuristic Tokyo. Master precision controls to dodge obstacles across 20 thrilling levels, and find your inner connection with speed in endless mode.

name: Moto Rush Reborn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Later
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo or faster
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant video card
  • Sound Card: Standard Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad highly recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Feel the pulse of retro-futuristic Tokyo veins urging you to go faster, drawing you deeper. Surrender to the speed, let the thrill consume your essence. Each surge, each flicker of light, is your path to glory or oblivion in 'Moto Rush Reborn'. Is your soul worth this speed?
